    • Uses of BSPNode in generation

      Subclasses of BSPNode in generation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BSPBranch
      BSPNodes are used to build a binary tree, where internal nodes keep track of lower and upper bounds of (x,y) coordinates.
      class  BSPLeaf
      A leaf node for a tree of BSPNodes.

      BSPNode Maze.getRootnode()
      Gets access to a tree of nodes for segments of wallboards which is used for drawing the currently visible part.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructors in generation with parameters of type BSPNode 
      Constructor and Description
      BSPBranch(int px, int py, int pdx, int pdy, BSPNode left, BSPNode right)
      Constructor with values for all internal fields Upper and lower bound values are obtained from the given left and right branches, so those trees must be carry valid values.

      private BSPNode MazeFileReader.readBSPNode(org.w3c.dom.Element eElement)
      Reads data for a BSPNode from file for the given element The method recursively explores the left and right branches and builds a complete tree.
